intro.text: FastStruct is redefining how homes and spaces are built. By combining modular and panelized construction, we deliver faster timelines, higher quality, and a smoother experience from start to finish.

items.question: Is modular or panelized construction more expensive than traditional building?
items.answer: Not necessarily. Faster timelines and efficient processes often lower overall costs with complete transparency from the start.

items.question: Will my home look like a “prefab box”?
items.answer: No — every project is fully customizable in layout and finishes.

items.question: How long does it take to build?
items.answer: Typically 3–5 months from permit approval to completion.

items.question: Do you handle permits and approvals?
items.answer: Yes — our team manages the entire process.

items.question: Is modular/panelized construction durable?
items.answer: Absolutely — built with light-gauge steel and high-performance materials for strength and longevity.

testimonial.quote: FastStruct crafted our forever home with unrivaled care. Every detail felt luxurious and personal.
